_comment: Pre-built index of SSA International Update articles by country (ISO3 code).
_source: U.S. Social Security Administration – International Update series
_note: Entries verified via web search. Dates are the SSA publication month. Add new entries manually or via: pp update-ssa-index

ARE.title: International Update, November 2023
ARE.topic: UAE: GPSSA enacts new federal social insurance pension law

ARG.title: International Update, April 2024
ARG.topic: Argentina: 12.5% pension increase; new formula linking adjustments to inflation

ARG.title: International Update, March 2024
ARG.topic: Argentina: President decrees inflation-linked benefit adjustments for contributory pensions

ARG.title: International Update, October 2022
ARG.topic: Argentina: Permanent 15.53% pension increase and monthly bonus for lower-income pensioners

AUS.title: International Update, February 2024
AUS.topic: Australia: Work Bonus policy expanded, allowing pensioners to earn more before benefit reduction

BEL.title: International Update, January 2025
BEL.topic: Belgium: Implements pension bonus for longer careers, new minimum pension rules, benefit adjustment caps

BEL.title: International Update, August 2023
BEL.topic: Belgium: Coalition announces pension reform agreement — pension bonus, minimum pension changes, solidarity contribution doubled

BGD.title: International Update, January 2023
BGD.topic: Bangladesh: Parliament approves new contributory old-age pension program for most citizens

BHR.title: International Update, April 2024
BHR.topic: Bahrain: New tiered employer contribution requirements for covered employees

BHR.title: International Update, March 2024
BHR.topic: Bahrain: New end-of-service gratuity system implemented for private-sector employees

BRN.title: International Update, June 2022
BRN.topic: Brunei: Announces new National Pension Scheme to replace existing provident fund programs

CAN.title: International Update, August 2022
CAN.topic: Canada: Permanent 10% increase to Old Age Security pension for recipients aged 75 and older

CHE.title: International Update, March 2024
CHE.topic: Switzerland: Voters approve 13th annual OASI payment; effective December 2026

CHN.title: International Update, October 2024
CHN.topic: China: Reforms Basic Pension Insurance — raises retirement age, increases contribution requirement, adds early/deferred retirement options

COL.title: International Update, September 2024
COL.topic: Colombia: Establishes new solidarity old-age pension for low-income residents aged 65+

CUB.title: International Update, February 2024
CUB.topic: Cuba: Decree changes how old-age and disability pensions are calculated for higher earners

DNK.title: International Update, January 2022
DNK.topic: Denmark: Parliament approves new means-tested early pension for workers with 42+ years of employment

EGY.title: International Update, July 2023
EGY.topic: Egypt: Launches Tomorrow's Pension — new voluntary USD-denominated program for citizens abroad

EGY.title: International Update, February 2020
EGY.topic: Egypt: Implements comprehensive pension reform (Law No. 148 of 2019) — coverage, financing, benefit formula overhaul

ESP.title: International Update, April 2023
ESP.topic: Spain: Pension reform law raises max covered earnings, introduces solidarity contribution for high earners

FRA.title: International Update, June 2023
FRA.topic: France: Pension reform raises legal retirement age; major public debate and protests

GBR.title: International Update, March 2022
GBR.topic: United Kingdom: Pensions Regulator publishes draft code for collective defined contribution (CDC) pension plans

IND.title: International Update, September 2024
IND.topic: India: Government approves Unified Pension Scheme (UPS) for federal and participating state employees

IRL.title: International Update, January 2024
IRL.topic: Ireland: New contributory State Pension provisions take effect — deferred retirement incentives, caregiver credits, higher rates

IRL.title: International Update, September 2022
IRL.topic: Ireland: Cabinet approves State Pension reform — deferred retirement, contribution rate increases, total contribution approach

JOR.title: International Update, April 2020
JOR.topic: Jordan: COVID-19 measures — employers may suspend or defer pension contributions for 3 months

JOR.title: International Update, April 2015
JOR.topic: Jordan: Gradual increase in old-age pension contribution rates begins

JPN.title: International Update, May 2022
JPN.topic: Japan: 2020 Pension Reform Law provisions take effect — higher max deferral age, reduced early retirement penalties

KGZ.title: International Update, October 2024
KGZ.topic: Kyrgyzstan: Eliminates early retirement and partial pension options; increases pensions from October 1

KOR.title: International Update, April 2024
KOR.topic: South Korea: Parliament reforms National Pension Service — higher contribution rate, higher replacement rate, expanded credits

KOR.title: International Update, August 2022
KOR.topic: South Korea: Employer-sponsored DC plans required to comply with new investment option rules

LBN.title: International Update, November 2013
LBN.topic: Lebanon: One of only two Arab jurisdictions without long-term social insurance — reform pressure noted

MAR.title: International Update, April 2020
MAR.topic: Morocco: COVID-19 — employers who maintain 80% payroll exempt from social security contributions

MAR.title: International Update, October 2019
MAR.topic: Morocco: New death grant and family support allowance programs introduced

MAR.title: International Update, October 2017
MAR.topic: Morocco: Work injury benefit reforms implemented

MEX.title: International Update, November 2024
MEX.topic: Mexico: Constitutional amendment lowers universal old-age pension eligibility age from 68 to 65

MEX.title: International Update, November 2022
MEX.topic: Mexico: Social security law extended to cover 2.3 million domestic workers (88% women)

NLD.title: International Update, June 2023
NLD.topic: Netherlands: Senate approves Future of Pensions Act — major overhaul of quasi-mandatory occupational pension system

NPL.title: International Update, August 2022
NPL.topic: Nepal: Old-age allowance minimum eligibility age lowered from 70 to 68

NZL.title: International Update, December 2021
NZL.topic: New Zealand: Residency requirement for NZ Superannuation to rise gradually from 10 to 20 years by 2042

PER.title: International Update, October 2024
PER.topic: Peru: New pension law restructures old-age system into four pillars

QAT.title: International Update, May 2022
QAT.topic: Qatar: Emir ratifies social insurance reform — expanded private-sector coverage, higher rates, tighter qualifying conditions

ROU.title: International Update, December 2023
ROU.topic: Romania: Social insurance reform law enacted — raises women's retirement age, modifies benefit formula

RWA.title: International Update, January 2025
RWA.topic: Rwanda: Presidential order increases contribution rate to compulsory pension scheme

SGP.title: International Update, December 2021
SGP.topic: Singapore: CPF changes for 2022 — higher contribution rates for workers 55–70, increased retirement and reemployment ages

THA.title: International Update, November 2022
THA.topic: Thailand: Employee and employer Social Security Fund contribution rates temporarily reduced Oct–Dec 2022

TUR.title: International Update, July 2024
TUR.topic: Turkey: New early withdrawal rules for voluntary BES individual pension accounts (marriage, home, disaster, education)

TUR.title: International Update, March 2023
TUR.topic: Turkey: Early retirement reform — ~5 million workers enrolled before Sep 1999 can retire at any age with 25/20 yrs coverage

TUR.title: International Update, March 2022
TUR.topic: Turkey: Private Pension System (BES) reforms — higher government matching, pre-retirement withdrawal, older worker enrollment

UGA.title: International Update, January 2022
UGA.topic: Uganda: President signs law allowing workers early access to pension savings

VCT.title: International Update, March 2024
VCT.topic: Saint Vincent and the Grenadines: NIS pension reform package — higher revenues, discouraged early retirement

VNM.title: International Update, November 2024
VNM.topic: Vietnam: Amended social insurance law — extended coverage, raised retirement age, lower contribution requirement, restricted lump-sum grants

XKX.title: International Update, January 2021
XKX.topic: Kosovo: Law allows pension participants to withdraw up to 10% of account balances as COVID-19 relief
